pages.text: By default you can excavate a lot of blocks at once when holding the §c~§r key, but you can't do this in the beginning. To excavate, your tool must have $(d)Excavation$() enchantment, or $(6)Excavation Modifier$() for tinkers' tools. Just apply the modifier to a tool with a Tool Forge. Both of the enchantment and the modifier have 5 levels, with fewer levels you can only excavate fewer blocks.

No matter what level the modifier is, it only takes up one modifier slot. Recipes can be found below. $(c)Note: $(4)$(l)Excavation consumes a lot of hunger$()$(c), it's suggested to explore caves to find ores rather than excavation stones.
